text: Brrda phu chod khela nı hmu mnusʹy nan ca klaw wa xari lea thi thahı phwk khea han xxk pi ca kkiblat khxng phwk khea thi phwk khea khey phin pi c khng klaw theid(mu xam mad) wa this tawanxxk læa this tawantk nan pen siththi khx ngxallxh theanan phraxngkh ca thrng næana phu thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh pi su thang xan theiyngtrng
